main.bio: Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience designing, developing, and implementing applications and solutions using a range of technologies and programming languages. Always seeking to leverage experience in Full-stack Node.js development, database integrations and Angular/React frontend applications, implementing solutions with data protection by design and default.
